text: Joel S. Engel is an American scientist. He was the Head of Research at Bell Laboratories (Belltel) in 1973. He was born on February 4, 1936 in New York City, New York. In 1973, Martin Cooper made the first mobile phone call to him whilst walking the streets of New York City. Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Scientists from New York (state) Category:People from New York City
title: Joel Engel
